summary: Result-oriented IT professional with 8+ years of experience in application development and enhancement across E-Commerce, Telecommunication, Insurance, and Public Safety domains. Proficient in developing web applications using React JS, Next JS, Node JS, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS, and SQL. Experienced in leveraging Gen AI and Prompt Engineering to enhance application functionalities. Demonstrated expertise in project life cycle methodologies such as Agile and Waterfall, along with hands-on experience in various development tools

projects.name: Current Project  - ACSS
projects.description: Our team migrated one of the biggest USA telecommunications brands' support software ACSS web app to React, enabling better customer support. Features include plan search, offer search, and customer information.

projects.description: Developed an e-commerce platform for Ariat, enabling seamless customer shopping and showcasing products.

projects.name: Project 4 - Control Works
projects.description: A web application for managing resources, workers, and incidents for public safety control rooms.

projects.description: Centralized system for login, registration, and profile management across multiple applications.
